ComicInfo.Summary:
Sasquatch and the Loch Ness Monster…The Kraken and the Mongolian Death Worm…thousands of people have seen these monsters and pictures and videos of these elusive creatures exist but no one has been able to capture one alive. The Monster Hunters Survival Guide will not only instruct you on how to be the first to catch one of these mysterious Cryptids but it’s the only way you’ll be able to survive the experience!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-10-03 01:03:01. [CVDB261209]
